name: review-board
description: Review Board is a self-hosted code review tool that integrates with Git, SVN, and Mercurial. It includes inline comments, diff views, and workflow tracking for engineering teams.

features.title: Code Review Workflow
features.description: Submit, review, and approve code changes before merging to main branches

features.title: Inline Comments
features.description: Add feedback directly on specific lines of code in diff views

features.title: Diff Visualization
features.description: View side-by-side or unified diffs with syntax highlighting

features.title: Vcs Integration
features.description: Connect to Git, SVN, Mercurial, and Perforce repositories

features.title: Review Requests
features.description: Create formal review requests with descriptions and reviewers

features.title: Issue Tracking
features.description: Link reviews to bug reports or feature requests for context

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Alert reviewers when new changes are submitted or comments added

features.title: Review History
features.description: Track all feedback and revisions throughout the review process
